title: Signal fault causing delays on the Circle Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 信号故障导致环线延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan isyarat menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Lingkar
title_translations.ta: வட்டப் பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் சமிக்ஞை தவறு

updates.text: [CCL] UPDATE: Normal train service resumed towards #HarbourFront. Free regular bus services still available till 11pm.
[CCL] UPDATE: Train service is progressively recovering.
[CCL]: Estimate 15mins additional travelling time from #Caldecott to #HarbourFront towards #HarbourFront due to signal fault.
